extDescription.message: Read untranslated document, go away from localized URL.

error_unsupportedURL.description: Action popup error message, when trigger action on pages like chrome:// URLs

error_URLMismatchLocale.message: URL and target Locale setting mismatch
error_URLMismatchLocale.description: Action popup error message, action triggered, but current URL not meet locale setting

error_unknownActionType.description: Mostly internal error, unexpected message received

error_otherError.description: General exception, error message will also be shown after it

error_invalidHostPattern.description: Form validation error in options page, host pattern invalid

flash_executed.description: Action popup's success message, not likely to be seen because the popup closed when success

options_saveReminder.description: In options page, reminder user to click save button

options_headerTriggerWhen.description: Options page section header, when should we do auto translation

options_headerDetails.description: Options page section header, for detail items

options_targetHostHint.message:
Skip https:// part, example: reactjs.org/docs;
Prefix with / to use regular expression, e.g., /^(docs|msdn)\.microsoft

options_targetLocalesHint.message: Can omit -XX part within xx-XX, example: set zh can also include zh-TW and zh_TW
